languages.text:
After a successful attack, these gauntlets grant the wearer a 50% chance to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect on enemies that fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent, the test is made with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
languages.original_text:
После успешной атаки перчатки дают владельцу 50% шанс наложить эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} на врагов, не прошедших {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}.
При убеждении {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — сторонник проверка проходит со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −20.

traits.locale_text:
After a successful attack, these gauntlets grant the wearer a 50% chance to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect on enemies that fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
If the wearer has Imperialis — Adherent, the test is made with a −20 penalty.

After a successful attack, these gauntlets grant the wearer a 50% chance to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect on enemies that fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent, the test is made with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

After a successful attack, these gauntlets grant the wearer a 50% chance to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect on enemies that fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent, the test is made with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

languages.text:
После успешной атаки перчатки дают владельцу 50% шанс наложить эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} на врагов, не прошедших {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}.
При убеждении {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — сторонник проверка проходит со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −20.

攻击成功后，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。如果目标未能通过检定，会有50%的几率获得{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。
如果装备者拥有信念{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}——拥护者，则目标此次检定会承受-20{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。
languages.original_text:
After a successful attack, these gauntlets grant the wearer a 50% chance to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on enemies that fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent, the test is made with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
攻击成功后，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。如果目标未能通过检定，会有50%的几率获得{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果。
如果装备者拥有信念“帝国主义——拥护者”，则目标此次检定会承受-20减值。

languages.text:
使用者の攻撃が成功した後、このガントレットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した敵に50%の確率で{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を与える。
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g} ― 門下生を持っていれば、判定は−20の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}が課せられる。
languages.original_text:
After a successful attack, these gauntlets grant the wearer a 50% chance to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on enemies that fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent, the test is made with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
自身の攻撃が成功した後、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した敵に50%の確率で{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}効果を付与。
自身が帝国 ― 門下生を持っている場合、判定ぶ−20のペナルティ。

languages.text:
Al impactar, estos guanteletes proporcionan al portador una probabilidad del 50 % de infligir el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} a los enemigos que no superen una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}.
Si el portador tiene {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}: Partidario, la prueba tiene una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20.
languages.original_text:
After a successful attack, these gauntlets grant the wearer a 50% chance to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect on enemies that fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent, the test is made with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Al impactar, estos guanteletes proporcionan al portador una probabilidad del 50 % de infligir el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} a los enemigos que no superen una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}.
Si el portador tiene Imperialis: Partidario, la prueba tiene una penalización de −20.

languages.text:
Nach einem erfolgreichen Angriff gewähren diese Handschuhe dem Träger eine Chance von 50 % auf das Verursachen des {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}-Effekts bei Feinden, die ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} nicht bestehen.
Hat der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} — Anhänger, erfolgt die Probe mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20.
languages.original_text:
After a successful attack, these gauntlets grant the wearer a 50% chance to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect on enemies that fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent, the test is made with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Nach einem erfolgreichen Angriff gewähren diese Handschuhe dem Träger eine Chance von 50 % auf das Verursachen des {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutungs{/g}-Effekts bei Feinden, die eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} nicht bestehen.
Hat der Träger Imperialis – Anhänger, wird die Probe mit -20 Abzug durchgeführt.

languages.text:
Après une attaque réussie, ces gantelets confèrent à leur utilisateur 50 % de chances d'infliger l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} aux ennemis qui échouent à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}.
Si l'utilisateur dispose d'{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} — Partisan, le test est passé avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −20.
languages.original_text:
After a successful attack, these gauntlets grant the wearer a 50% chance to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect on enemies that fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent, the test is made with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Après une attaque réussie, ces gantelets confèrent à leur utilisateur 50 % de chances d'infliger l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} aux ennemis qui échouent à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}.
Si l'utilisateur dispose d'Imperialis — Partisan, le test est passé avec une pénalité de -20.
